snippet.description: Animal-loving kids will adore getting up close and personal with goats, rabbits, pot-bellied pigs, and many other farm animals on this five-acre working farm. ...

snippet.title: Straight from the Tree: Eco-Friendly Apple Picking
snippet.description: This eco-friendly apple farm is the top pick for both locals and travelers.

snippet.title: The Farm
snippet.description: The Farm bills itself as a 'living museum of rural America': A working farm where children can see and participate in the care of animals and crops and learn about the history of farming in the rural United States....

snippet.title: Green Meadows Petting Farm
snippet.description: A petting zoo with over 300 farm animals, including pigs, turkeys, donkeys, geese, and cows. Guided tours are available...

snippet.title: Grant's Farm
snippet.description: Adults know it as the ancestral home of Budweiser beer's Busch family, but kids love Grant's Farm for the animals they can touch, pet, and feed here. ...

snippet.title: Book Review: Farm
snippet.description: Catchy art and story, all about the rhythms of farm life.
